title: Secure and Reliable Wireless Private Network Facilitates Digital Transformation of Power Distribution and Consumption - Huawei Enterprise
summary: The article discusses how the digital transformation of the power distribution sector requires a secure and reliable wireless private network. This network, powered by 3GPP wireless broadband technology, overcomes limitations of traditional power distribution communications systems by providing high-speed data access, low latency, and increased security. Huawei's Smart Grid eLTE Private Network Solution is highlighted as a solution that meets these needs and is already being implemented by customers in the electric power industry.
product_or_process: Smart Grid eLTE Private Network Solution
likely_naics_codes: ['517210 - Wired Telecommunications Carriers', '517910 - Wireless Telecommunications Carriers', '237110 - Electrical Power Generation, Transmission, and Distribution', '541511 - Custom Computer Programming Services']
greenwashing: The article does not present the innovation as being environmentally friendly or sustainable, focusing primarily on its technical benefits for the power industry.
